title: Talu a chyflwyno - statws
paragraph1: You'll usually get the grant of representation within 16 weeks of submitting your application.

update.failure: Nid oedd modd inni gyflwyno eich cais. Mae eich data wedi cael ei arbed, rhowch gynnig arall arni yn nes ymlaen.

errors.validation: Roedd problem wrth geisio arbed eich cais.
